description: Kyohei takes Kukuri to the Utsuwashi, the clan that repairs the Kakashi. He finds that the Takemikazuchi has been sent their as well. Utao is told by the head of the Kuga clan that Kirio is her younger twin brother. Kirio, who was abused by the Hyuga clan, is taken in by Koushiro. Utao thinks about what she should do to be friends her younger brother.
